Question
========

You buy 10 lottery tickets for €1 each. With each lottery ticket you have a chance of 0.06 to win €10. If you take into account the cost of the lottery tickets, what is the standard deviation of your profit?

Answerlist
----------

* € 0,56
* € 1
* € 7,51
* € 10

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* € 0.56: Incorrect
* 1 €: Incorrect
* € 7,51: Correct
* € 10: Incorrect
